title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 386.2 - Staff development positions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 386.2 - Staff development positions

State Regulations

Each social services district employing 250 or more
persons should employ a staff development director and such additional
qualified staff development persons as shall be necessary to implement the
district's staff development program. (b) Each social services district employing
90 or more but less than 250 persons should employ a staff development
supervisor and such additional qualified staff development persons as shall be
necessary to implement the district's staff development program. (c) Each social services district employing
fewer than 90 persons should employ a staff development coordinator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
386.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
